text: Marc-André Fleury (born November 28, 1984) is a French-Canadian ice hockey goaltender. He plays for the Minnesota Wild. He also played for the Pittsburgh Penguins, Vegas Golden Knights, and Chicago Blackhawks. He has also played hockey internationally for the Canadian men's national team. During his time with Team Canada, Fleury won the gold medal at the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Olympic gold medalists for Canada Category:Cape Breton Screaming Eagles players Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Medalists at the 2010 Winter Olympics Category:Minnesota Wild players Category:Pittsburgh Penguins players Category:Sportspeople from Quebec Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Vegas Golden Knights players Category:Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins players
title: Marc-André Fleury
